content: to end round 6- kfb k to 2 sts from end of needle kfb k1 twice increase 2 sts per needle sock dk rnds 7-28- work rnds 5 and 6 eleven more times 30 rnds 7-24- work rnds 5 and 6 nine more times 26 sts sts per needle per needle rnds 29-31- work round 5 three times rnds 25-27- work round 5 three times round 32- work round 6 32 sts per needle round 28- work round 6 28 sts per needle rnds 33-41- work round 5 nine times rnds 29-33- work round 5 six times round 42- to split for top k1 k2tog k13 start new round 34- to split for top k1 k2tog k11 start new needle k13 ssk k1 twice sts are now on 4 needles 15 needle k11 ssk k1 twice sts are now on 4 needles 13 sts per needle sts per needle needle 4- back of right top needle 3- back of left top needle 1- front of right top working right top on needle 2- needles 1 and 4 front of left top right top working on right half only needle 1 and needle 4 sock/dk round 1- needle 1- knit to end join to needle 4 needle 4- knit to end rnds 2-3- knit to end round 4- k1 k2tog k to 3 sts from end of needle ssk k1 twice 2 sts decreased per needle round 5- knit to end sock dk rnds 6-9- work round 4 four times rnds 6-8- work round 4 three times round 10- k1 cdd k1 twice 3 sts per needle round 9- k1 cdd k1 twice 3 sts per needle sock/dk cut yarn use tail to cinch top 6 sts leave tail out stuff heart with polyfil or scraps of fabric or yarn version 1 may 12 2023 2 plushy heart knit working left top on needles 2 and 3 left top working on left half only needle 2 and needle 3 sock/dk attach yarn at front center of heart beginning of needle 2 leave tail out round 1- needle 2- knit to end needle 3- knit to end join to needle 2 sock dk rnds 2-10- work as right top rnds 2-10 rnds 2-9- work as right top rnds 2-9 sock/dk cut yarn use tail to cinch top 6 sts leave tail out stuff rest of heart with polyfil or scraps of fabric or yarn finishing sock/dk use tapestry needle to thread top two tails into the heart pulling the yarn all the way through to tug top of heart point down makes it round instead of pointy stitch center hole with tail weave in ends hiding ends and closing center hole assisting top shape if you choose not to stuff your heart and keep it flat i recommend gentle wet blocking version 1 may 12 2023 3 plushy heart knit yarn and designs that inspire your greates t creations www yarnovernewyork com www yarnovernewyork com http
